price: 2. Kuwase gaalada ahi waxay ku sugan yihiin qabwayni iyo collaytan (xaq diiddo).
arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي عِزَّةٖ وَشِقَاقٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: bali alladhīna kafarū fī ʿizzatin washiqāqin
